thread.title: Babatunde Giwa-Otusajo
thread.title_full: Tech Live Connect reviewed by Babatunde Giwa-Otusajo

author: Babatunde Giwa-Otusajo
title: Babatunde Giwa-Otusajo
text: I apparently thought the whole idea of helping me fix my computer at such minimal cost was fake but I later found out how legit and brilliant the technicians were. They did a very good job on my computer and I truly would recommend them.
